column1: The Pit Room////If you've had mid Texas BBQ
column2: then you'll know this place is relatively close in comparison to the BBQ capital of Texas
column3: Austin. I would say the sides here are much more flavorful than most BBQ spots. The BBQ sauce itself was very unique in flavor. Had more of a thick texture like marinara sauce. Imagine a smoked sweet tomato sauce that has the tangy consistency like your traditional bbq sauce.
